Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mullin
There were no other sightings in Mullin on or around September 7th 2008
Summary: First; two seperate lights about 11 o'clock high, second blimp shape with 3 bright lights about 2 o'clock high
divs: sighting detailsas i was driving i saw this bright light aiming down at first i thought it was a plane turning but after a few minutes i noticed it did not move, then i saw a second light they moved around about 11 o'clock high then one of them came down and headed strait up and disappeared. just then as i glanced around there was this huge blimp looking object with three bright lights moving slowly. the bright lights appeared to be rotating, as it moved left to right in a slow motion, i stared at it for a while as it disappeared into some clouds on my right side. the objects to my left at 11 o'clock was clear as can be. months before that coming across hwy 29 west bound from i-35 halfway towards hwy 183 on my motorcycle at exactly 12 midnight i noticed a bright light coming fast behind me, at first i thought it was a car but coming so fast i thought this driver will not see me and may hit me at that speed. i could tell the speed as i glanced through my mirror and it was moving way too fast. this light was lighting up the whole road. as i edged towards the shoulder the light passed me about 1 o'clock high. it was almost a blinding light. i could hear like a crackling sound as it passed over me. the fourth and only time i had seen another set of lights going north\west almost 45 minutes from santa anna there appeared in the sky a group of lights about 1 o'clock high just as they appeared they disappeared. these have been the only times i have ever seen anything like this. since then i have been curious as to what they are. i tend to beleive these were not aircrafts the way they were moving and swirling around as for the blimp like object i had never seen such brightness glancing at the blimp it almost looked metalic as it slowly disappear into some of the clouds and the light reflected that was when i noticed how large it was. this was just amazing. for some that may think only nuts report this well, i am college educated and have worked in professional fields and very competent. i do beleive in our god and savior but somehow would like to find out more of what others in the govt want to keep from us.
